title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body:
Never had this before, I can not login. I play on EUW.

''Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here, if it looks good follow the guide here''.

Anyone else having this?

replies.body: This was me guys. Sorry. It should be clearing up soon!
Any info on this ? Would love to play some LoL :)
If anyone has a problem I just had this happen today but when I disabled sound on the client settings it worked!

Riot Adabard, I'm still having issues with my client saying "Unable to connect to the login queue..."

I have reinstalled the game 2 times and have followed what directions or quick fixes I could find on the threads.

I'm not sure what I should do.

I have been having this issue for several days

I'm on the NA servers

Its a simple fix for anyone who is still stuck after all the troubleshooting, uninstall and THEN delete riot folder completely, then reinstall and runs perfectly.  you can thank my by un permabanning my JungleTeem0 account thanks.
Been 5 days for me. All I wanna do is play some league
cant log at all
@Riot Adabard C'mon man. Spill the details. Dont leave us in the dark
How long will this take?? 2 hours and no update or details..... Highly frustrating as I only get a certain amount of time to slot a few games of league in to
This appears to be resolving now that we've bypassed the problem cluster. I apologize for the pain caused on this. I know it was hard and it sucks. Thank you for understanding.
not completely fixed for NA east coast it seems

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Adabard,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=WEK0auGA,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2017-06-05T18:55:42.284+0000)
>
> This appears to be resolving now that we've bypassed the problem cluster. I apologize for the pain caused on this. I know it was hard and it sucks. Thank you for understanding.

Because of this, myself nor mine friends are able to invite each other - how can u mess up this badly friend?

> [{quoted}](name=How2WasteLP,realm=EUW,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=WEK0auGA,comment-id=00170001,timestamp=2017-06-05T19:16:06.821+0000)
>
> Because of this, myself nor mine friends are able to invite each other - how can u mess up this badly friend?

That sounds like a different issue. If you're unable to invite each other, I'd recommend restarting the client.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Adabard,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=WEK0auGA,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2017-06-05T18:55:42.284+0000)
>
> This appears to be resolving now that we've bypassed the problem cluster. I apologize for the pain caused on this. I know it was hard and it sucks. Thank you for understanding.

Works again for me, thanks for the quick reaction to the problem.
PLS HELP ME
I can't log in great...

I have been trying to login in for over an hour now and I am still unable too as well. I have seen that some of the admins are saying that this is fixed, is it? I live in NA on the East Coast as well.
Unable to login still, even sent a support ticket. I live in North America East Coast.
We just implemented a bypass for the problem cluster and are getting reports that some folks are logging in. Can you try it now?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Adabard,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=WEK0auGA,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2017-06-05T18:41:48.979+0000)
>
> We just implemented a bypass for the problem cluster and are getting reports that some folks are logging in. Can you try it now?

Yeah it works but I had to wait LONG in queue {{item:3073}}

Seems like it's fixed.
If we can get through the waiting queue, that is... ;)

Thanks for keeping us updated!
Working now, thank you for your work and have a nice day. :)

You're magnificent ;)

Ireland, just logged into NA and I'm all happy!
Just wanted to pop in since it's been a while since I've updated. We're looking at cutting our problem cluster but need to scale up the fallback to handle the traffic.
Are you gonna fix it any soon ? Gotta know if I should go to sleep tonight :D{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I'm sure there's an answer to something in this reply, but it's hidden from the average Joe in a jumble of tech talk.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Adabard,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=WEK0auGA,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2017-06-05T18:25:30.762+0000)
>
> Just wanted to pop in since it's been a while since I've updated. We're looking at cutting our problem cluster but need to scale up the fallback to handle the traffic.

You sir, made a lot of people sad tonight :(


*A sad soul who just wanted to have a casual game with friends~*
What is the estimate time of repair?

Hey DodeKnecht, we've seen most regions recover but EUNE, EUW, RU, and TR are likely still having issues. I'm working with another engineer on my team to get this fixed up for you as soon as we can. I'm sorry for the convenience. I know it's really frustrating and crappy when you can't login. :(

Any updates on what's going on or fixes etc would be greatly appreciated. Getting left out in the cold like this feels a little rubbish. Been encountering this problem for hours now - and can see that some people reportedly haven't been able to log in for days (!). I, MiniYanb, and Puer8 are all getting affected by this.

Honestly, any updates would be great!

So maybe some free RP for this :) I just came from work and I made a new password thinking I got my old bad or some problem with it. And know I read that Riot did this .... 

This is so sad.... and I have like one hour left before my girl is coming from work and no playtime on LOL after that.
it works again

> [{quoted}](name=WarLordSebo,realm=EUW,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=WEK0auGA,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-06-05T17:23:51.310+0000)
>
> it works again

Not for me
Just want to say NA login is still not working for me so looks like NA issues arent totally resolved yet.

> [{quoted}](name=zaptheimpaler,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=WEK0auGA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-06-05T17:00:58.397+0000)
>
> Just want to say NA login is still not working for me so looks like NA issues arent totally resolved yet.

If you are located in the general vicinity of Europe, you will likely have these issues. Where, approximately, are you located? I don't need your exact address. :)
I'm in Ireland and cannot connect to NA (my server of choice).
i am from austria how long will that take ?
so it has somthing to do with the location not the region ?

yes me 2 
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na

i have same prolem right now...
any info on this?

Riot Adabard
 
Im having the same problem i have unistalled and made a complete problem fix at server settings, turn the sound of and still notting can u help? EUW
I am having same issue , i cant get to login queue , i am on EUNE
For anyone experiencing this issue, I just fixed it by going to my program folder and opening the RADS_user_kernel. It seemed to have crashed and by opening it windows fixed the issue.
Bro i got you.  uninstall completely on control panel.  delete the c:\RIOT folder completely.  then reinstall ( as admin ) and league it up bae, u can add me in client and thank me with a duo match
Is there a fix to this? I'm having Issues right now
I haven't been able to play for a week and a half.. still saying the same "unable to connect to login queue". I'm legit crying
I can't login ;-;, same problem

Gooood morningg.

Am experiencing the "check client status, etc etc" fail to login thing, tried over and over again and after waiting about 5 minutes straight for it to load I got disconnected immediately. Began "attempting to reconnect" me and has been for 10 minutes or so. 

Was attempting log in to NA servers (as I always have) and did all troubleshoot steps and internet connection is perfect so it isn't my end, is this issue still happening Adabard?

UPDATE: Took so long, so I selected "exit instead," and then my client wouldn't start at all. Restarted computer, back to square one. 
You are lucky we already sold our souls to you rito {{champion:412}}
Try again summoners!! should be working now. Egypt is working fine now.
